channel.title: Another plea for help... About compiler
channel.description: Ok when i run my compiler it says i need java files?? :confused: Can someone post a link for me to download them at or just tell me a tut where i can get them.. thanks a lot tuptup

item.title: Another plea for help... About compiler
item.dc:creator: @tuptup13 tuptup13
item.description:
@tuptup13 wrote:

Please choose an option below to do that function.
Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for
any updates that I post.

c - Compile your server.
r - To Run your server.
e - To exit out of the program.
jar - It will create your server into an executable Jar archive.
color - Change the Text and Backround colors of this compiler.
reset - Resets your Compiler Logs.

Option:

???^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Thats what it says… when i type in C as and option It does:

You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0 or any JDK 5.0 and 6.0 updates.
Go to Mod Taharok’s tutorial on the Moparscape Tuturoials section
for step-by-step instructions to download the newest JDK Update.
Press any key to continue . . .
??? please help

Read full topic
item.source: Another plea for help... About compiler

item.title: Another plea for help... About compiler
item.dc:creator: @srisrusry srisrusry
item.description:
@srisrusry wrote:

try use mine that work @echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

hope i could help

Read full topic

item.title: Another plea for help... About compiler
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

then use a different compiler,i have that problem too sometimes,check if this works.

@echo off title rofl,wtf,bitch ass,nigga. Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

easy,and simple.
